__etcd R client__

## Installation

Install `etseed`

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sckott/etseed")
```

```{r}
library("etseed")
```

## Start etcd

at the command line on OSX

```sh
brew install etcd
etcd
```

done.

## Get version

```{r}
version()
```

## List keys

```{r}
keys()
```

## List a key

```{r}
key("mykey")
```
